title: 02x6: 18 U.S.C. § 207(j) Waiver of Certain Post-Government Employment Restrictions
summary: OGE summarizes 18 U.S.C. § 207(j), concurs that a proposed waiver under 18 U.S.C. § 207(j)(5) would permit a former employee to furnish scientific or technological information to his former agency, and provides guidance concerning the scope of the proposed waiver.
